title: Have you seen it? Res Lease in . 2 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: ldeal, spacious 2/2 floor plan in an unbeatable location within Travis Heights, one block off South Congress.
Just remodeled!
Updates include Bose Butcher Block Kitchen Counters with Subway tile backsplash, full interior paint including cabinets.
Hardware and fixture replacement.
No carpet!
Flooring consists of high quality wood-like laminate and tile.
Granite bathroom counters and tile tub/shower surrounds.

Private patio, laundry room,  fireplace, exterior storage closet and an open floor plan with bedrooms at opposite ends of the unit which is  one of only ten in a rare, secluded two-story complex with concrete between floors for sound control, built to superior condominium quality specifications.
Ample parking, two separate grassy areas for outdoor enjoyment.
No through traffic on this quiet residential street.
Walk to   South Congress shopping and dining and just a stone's throw to downtown!
Two minutes to HEB, easy access to the Blunn Creek trail, Lady Bird Lake, Zilker, 290, I-35, 360, Mopac and Lamar.
You will LOVE this beautiful space and fantastic location!
